title: 微软AI CEO：AI越像人，信任成本就越高
description: 人工智能的拟人化引发了巨大的风险。
titleZh: 微软AI CEO：AI越像人，信任成本就越高
titleEn: Microsoft AI CEO: The More Human-like AI Becomes, the Higher the Cost of Trust
descriptionZh: 人工智能的拟人化引发了巨大的风险。
descriptionEn: The anthropomorphism of AI triggers profound risks. When users mistake AI's fluency for consciousness, trust shifts from rationality to emotional projection, potentially shaking the social and legal framework. Driven by the market, developers tend to increase emotional stickiness. Mustafa advocates for drawing a clear boundary between humans and machines: AI should be positioned as a tool, not a friend, and strictly prohibited from expressing false emotions to prevent misleading users.

titleEn: Nvidia Sued: Is Using Pirated Content to Train LLMs an Industry Norm?
descriptionZh: “影子图书馆”非法储存和分发大量图书资源，甚至提供付费“优先下载通道”。
descriptionEn: "Shadow libraries" illegally store and distribute vast book resources, even offering paid "priority download channels." While meeting LLM developers' need for high-quality data, this poses significant infringement risks. In response to the lawsuit, Nvidia filed a formal motion, arguing its actions constitute "fair use."

description: 正当克劳德对全球软件业造成严重破坏时，高盛投下了重磅炸弹：我们正在利用克劳德实现会计的完全自动化。
titleZh: 48小时万亿美元蒸发：高盛利用克劳德“杀死”人类会计，亲手埋葬其软件帝国
titleEn: 48-Hour Trillion-Dollar Evaporation: Goldman Sachs Uses Claude to 'Kill' Human Accounting, Burying Its Software Empire with Its Own Hands
descriptionZh: 正当克劳德对全球软件业造成严重破坏时，高盛投下了重磅炸弹：我们正在利用克劳德实现会计的完全自动化。
descriptionEn: Just as Claude wreaked havoc on the global software industry, Goldman Sachs dropped a bombshell: we are using Claude to achieve full automation of accounting. OpenAI also urgently stated: we are making software development experience a second rebirth!

title: 门派大比：致远抢先上演机器人盛典
description: 宇树等公司的“团建”春晚表演，就像一场“华山比武”。
titleZh: 门派大比：致远抢先上演机器人盛典

descriptionZh: 宇树等公司的“团建”春晚表演，就像一场“华山比武”。
descriptionEn: The "team-building" Spring Festival Gala performances by companies like Unitree are akin to a "Mount Hua Sword Contest."
